                  GriffonController controller,

                  Object... args)
        Execute the action using registered ActionHandlers.
        Parameters:
        controller - the controller that owns the action
        actionName - the action's name
        args - additional arguments to be sent to the action

void addActionInterceptor(@Nonnull

        Deprecated. use addActionHandler instead.

        actionInterceptor - the interceptor to be added to this ActionManager
